TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatusStrip extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip

summary.span: 代表一個 Windows 狀態列控制項。

span.span: Represents a Windows status bar control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取代控制項。 replaces the control. 特殊功能包括自訂表格配置中，支援表單的縮放或移動想盡辦法，以及支援屬性，讓來自動填滿可用空間。Special features of include a custom table layout, support for the form's sizing and moving grips, and support for the property, which allows a to fill available space automatically. 下列項目專為與兩者都能完美合作和在所有方向。The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both and in all orientations. 它們是在設計階段的預設可用的控制項：They are available by default at design time for the control: - - - - 控制項會顯示 上正在檢視之物件或該物件之元件的相關資訊，或顯示與該物件在您的應用程式中作業相關的內容資訊。A control displays information about an object being viewed on a , the object's components, or contextual information that relates to that object's operation within your application. 一般而言， 控制項是由 物件所組成，其中每個物件會顯示文字和 (或) 圖示。Typically, a control consists of objects, each of which displays text, an icon, or both. 也可以包含 、 和 控制項。The can also contain , , and controls. 預設 沒有面板。The default has no panels. 若要將面板加入，使用方法或使用[StatusStrip 項目集合編輯器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/ms233631(v=vs.100))在設計階段加入、 移除或重新排列項目和修改屬性。To add panels to a , use the method, or use the [StatusStrip Items Collection Editor](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/ms233631(v=vs.100)) at design time to add, remove, or reorder items and modify properties. 使用[StatusStrip 工作對話方塊](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2008/ms233642(v=vs.90))在設計階段執行的常見命令。Use the [StatusStrip Tasks Dialog Box](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2008/ms233642(v=vs.90)) at design time to run common commands. 雖然 會取代及擴充舊版的 控制項，但是您也可以選擇保留 ，以提供回溯相容性及供未來使用。Although replaces and extends the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範包含各種常見的屬性集。The following code example demonstrates a with various common properties set. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps/VB/form1.vb#0)]

span.span: StatusStrip Items Collection Editor
StatusStrip Tasks Dialog Box
StatusStrip Control

related.span: 如何：在 StatusStrip 中以互動方式使用 Spring 屬性

span.span: How to: Use the Spring Property Interactively in a StatusStrip

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true 時，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle Dock { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property Dock As DockStyle
public: virtual property System::Windows::Forms::DockStyle Dock { System::Windows::Forms::DockStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DockStyle value); };
member this.Dock : System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定停駐在其父控制項的 框線，並決定 隨其父代重新調整大小的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets which borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a is resized with its parent.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來定義如何其父控制項調整大小時，會自動調整大小。Use the property to define how a is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 例如，設定要導致本身配合其父控制項的左邊緣，並調整大小的父控制項調整大小時。For example, setting to causes the to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized. 控制項停駐在其的疊置順序，也就是表單的 z 軸 （深度） 以及在表單上控制項的視覺分層。Controls are docked in their Z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's Z-axis (depth). 控制項可以固定到其父容器的一個邊緣或所有邊緣可以停都駐並填滿父容器。A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範各種常見的屬性與設定，包括屬性。The following code example demonstrates a with various common properties set, including the property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CommonProps/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使屬性設定為`true`並屬性設定為`Visible`，將不會顯示大小調整控點，除非也設定溢位值的其中一個屬性。Even with the property set to `true` and the property set to `Visible`, the sizing grip will not be displayed unless you also set the property to one of the overflow values. 如果屬性設定為或，將不會顯示調整大小底框。If the property is set to or , the sizing grip will not be displayed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範各種常見的屬性與設定，包括屬性。The following code example demonstrates a with various common properties set, including the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void WndProc (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message m);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void WndProc(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub WndProc (ByRef m As Message)

span.span: The Windows to process.

summary.span: 處理 Windows 訊息。

span.span: Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構包裝 Windows 會傳送的訊息。The structure wraps messages that Windows sends. 您可以使用這個結構包裝訊息，並將它指派給分派的視窗程序。You can use this structure to wrap a message and assign it to the window procedure to be dispatched. 您也可以使用這個結構以取得有關訊息的資訊系統會傳送至您的應用程式或控制項。You can also use this structure to get information about a message the system sends to your application or controls. 您無法建立直接結構。You cannot create the structure directly. 若要建立結構，請使用方法。To create a structure, use the method. 若要建立程序結構更有效率，結構會使用其現有的集區結構，而不是盡可能建立一個新的執行個體。To make creating structures more efficient, the structure uses its pool of existing structures instead of creating an instance of a new one, if possible. 不過，如果結構是不在集區中，在建立結構的新執行個體。However, if a structure is not available in the pool, a new instance of the structure is created.
